import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home-layout', templateUrl: './home-layout.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home-layout.component.scss'] }) export class HomeLayoutComponent implements OnInit { constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }

Hi, my name is

Gaurav Kumar.

Master of Web & Data Science

Bachelor of Engineering - Information Science Engineering

I am a computer science enthusiast interested in Data Analyst, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, Web Development and Back End Development. I want to make computers smarter and useful in solving daily problems and help us in a smarter way. You can find the list of the projects which I have worked on in the projects tab. I am actively looking for job opportunities with organizations who can leverage my skills and experience and at the same time provide me with a challenge. Offline I am great company to hang out, with my hobbies ranging from playing chess, travelling, public speaking, working out, photography and a lot more.

Select any tab to know about me and my skills
